messages.title: Vote Green Party for the common good
messages.content: I am your Green Party candidate for MP & a longtime Lewisham resident. After a community campaigner trained in environmental science.

messages.title: LEWISHAM'S CLOSEST CONTENDER TO LABOUR
messages.content: Last year, in both Council & European elections, Greens came second to Labour across Lewisham. Green Party surge is the real politics that last the general election. There is no chance of LibDem or Tory victory here. So in this election you can vote for what you believe in. The Greens can challenge Labour here. A Green MP would make a real impact for Lewisham, leading the protected vote based on policy, not party, party Green.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support small businesses at risk of being priced out. A wealth tax on the top 1%. Close global tax loopholes. Introduce a living wage. Stop renewal of Trident nuclear missiles - saving £100 billion.
Fair caps on rents. Support nonprofit & community housing. Reuse of empty buildings. Fund insulation of low income homes. Ensure new development is environmentally sound across the UK.

Real community involvement in planning decisions. Cut air pollution - which kills more than obesity or alcoholism. Invest in technology for energy security. Slash carbon emissions. Segregated cycle lanes.

Stop privatisation of our NHS by Labour, Tory & LibDems. Renationalise our railways & cut fares. Exclude cuts to social care for disabled & older people. Ensure state education remains in local control.

issues.economy: Support small businesses at risk of being priced out. A wealth tax on the top 1%. Close global tax loopholes. Introduce a living wage.
issues.education: Ensure state education remains in local control.
issues.environment: Real community involvement in planning decisions. Cut air pollution - which kills more than obesity or alcoholism. Invest in technology for energy security. Slash carbon emissions.
issues.health: Stop privatisation of our NHS by Labour, Tory & LibDems.
issues.socialWelfare: Exclude cuts to social care for disabled & older people.

housing.content: Fair caps on rents. Support nonprofit & community housing. Reuse of empty buildings. Fund insulation of low income homes. Ensure new development is environmentally sound across the UK.
